documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, spanning July 23, 2019, to August 9, 2019. The records detail daily inmate counts, housing unit assignments, and out-counts for various activities (e.g., work details, hospital, attorney visits). Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate (Register No. 76318-054) in housing unit H01-001L, with assignments for attorney visits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York in July and August 2019, with register number 76318-054 and housing assignment H01-001L.
Epstein is regularly listed on inmate rosters with assignment 'ATTY', indicating scheduled attorney visits on multiple dates from July 23 to August 9, 2019.

The documents show routine daily inmate counts and out-counts for various activities (e.g., work details, hospital, attorney visits) at the MCC, with total inmate population fluctuating around 750-776.
Several other inmates are frequently listed with hospital (HOSP) assignments, indicating medical or suicide watch status (e.g., Gama-Pineda, Decapua, Bullock, Tisdale, Weber).
The records are administrative Bureau of Prisons forms (count sheets, inmate rosters, out-count forms) providing a detailed log of inmate movements and assignments during Epstein's incarceration.
